title: Acer Chromebook Spin 514 gets Ryzen 5000 refresh from $579 – Here’s a first look [Gallery]
content:
Ushering in a new era of AMD chips on Chrome OS, the Acer Chromebook Spin 514 is getting a 2022 refresh with a Ryzen 5000 series chip and other new tweaks. And, we’ve had a chance to take an early look at the device.

more…

The post Acer Chromebook Spin 514 gets Ryzen 5000 refresh from $579 – Here’s a first look [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Acer Chromebook Spin 514 is getting a 2022 refresh that delivers a Ryzen 5000 series processor and some other tweaks. Here's a first look.
